description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. It's Dwarf Madness! A Zombi infestation forced Dwarves to leave their home of Dwyll and all the Gold they stored there, 300 years ago. Today, 4 Dwarves with Guns head back to Dwyll to take back what is theirs, and paint the walls with Zombi blood! 1-4 player Co-Op has multiple upgradable Guns and lots of enchanted Gear - but you'll need enough Gold to buy it first!
description.short: It's Dwarf Madness! A Zombi infestation forced Dwarves to leave their home of Dwyll and all the Gold they stored there, 300 years ago.
